org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies

Class FederationPolicyInitializationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.FederationPolicyInitializationContext

  • public class FederationPolicyInitializationContext
extends Object
    Context to (re)initialize a FederationAMRMProxyPolicy and FederationRouterPolicy.
